name: ノイズ
message: "No problem."
When I see who it is...<K> my heart just about stops.

name: 羽賀
message: "You're..."

name: キオ
message: "Oh-ho?"

name: ミオ
message: "It's that pervert!"
I told myself that it didn't matter, as long as he was happy somewhere.
Time would heal my loneliness.
But now... there he is.
That's startling enough, but what really surprises me is how he looks.
In that classy suit, he looks so different that I almost don't recognize him.
His hair is neatly trimmed, and all his piercings have vanished.
Am I dreaming?
He smiles and walks up to me.

name: ノイズ
message: "So you're still working here."

name: ノイズ
message: "And you still have that ugly mug."

name: 蒼葉
message: "W-What about you... What's with the monkey suit?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Cool, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Cool? Is that all you...!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You never called... you never answered when I tried to get touch... and now you show up out of the blue..."
I'm freaking out. I don't even know what I'm saying.
All I know is that the sight of him has woken something inside me.
I stand up and glare at him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What have you been doing this whole time?! You couldn't call?! You couldn't even send a message?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "And now you waltz in here in your fancy suit asking me if you look cool?! What the hell, man..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Were you worried about me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Worried?! Are you crazy?! Of course I was worried!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Did you miss me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?! M-Miss you?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. Did you wish you could see me again?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh! You little shit!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't get so worked up."
Noiz grabs me by the nape of the neck and pulls me toward him.
And then...

name: ナオ
message: "Woooooow!!!"

name: キオ
message: "They kiiiiiissed!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh... What the hell... do you think you're doing?!"
I cover my freshly kissed lips with my hand. My face is hot enough to burn.
I can't believe he did that in the middle of the store! With Mr. Haga watching! And those little shits, too!

name: 蒼葉
message: "You... You haven't changed at all!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Sure I have. I'm responsible now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Responsible?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. I came to get you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Get me?"
Noiz fiddles with his necktie, pretending to tighten it.

name: ノイズ
message: "I went back home."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where's home?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Germany."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Germany?!"
Definitely wouldn't have been my first guess...

name: ノイズ
message: "I hadn't been back since running away. My parents never cared, but my little bro'd been searching for me the whole time. He cried when he saw me."

name: ノイズ
message: "Seems my old man's been grooming him to take over. Shoulda seen the look on his face when I asked if I could help. He was so happy, man."

name: ノイズ
message: "And uh, I actually did apologize to my parents... They didn't say much, but, well, I've got plenty of time to make up for it."

name: ノイズ
message: "Anyway, there was a lot to do. It ended up taking longer than I expected."
I can't believe what I'm hearing. He really is taking responsibility for his life.
I spent so much time wondering what he was doing, but I never for a moment imagined this.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're something else, man."

name: ノイズ
message: "Can't go charging into things like a dumbass anymore. Had to get my act together."

name: ノイズ
message: "So, how 'bout it? You're coming, right? ...Wait, no. Let me do that again."

name: ノイズ
message: "Come with me. Please."
For a long time, I just stare at him, not knowing what to say.
It's all so sudden. But at the same time... it makes me really happy.
He did all this for me...

But it's not an easy decision to make.
I have a life here. I have Granny.
I have to decide. But how?
